title: Bloomberg Markets: Yellati on Temer Scandal Impact on Brazil
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Yellati on Temer Scandal Impact on Brazil
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Hernan Yellati Head of EM Strategy Barclay Investments Discussing the alleged cover-up scandal involving Brazilian President Temer and the impact it has on investing in the country.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
